column2: The carrying value of equity securities is measured as the total initial cost plus the cumulative net gain loss.

column1: Gains and losses including impairments are included as a component of OI&E in the Consolidated Statements of
Income.  See  Note  6  for  further  details  on  OI&E.  Certain  of  our  non-marketable  equity  securities  include  our
investments in variable interest entities VIE where we are not the primary beneficiary. See Note 4 for further details
